long_description: The lightweight men's Kuhl Rekon Jacket makes a great travel companion on windy days, whether you're exploring urban canyons or wave-tossed coastlines. Cotton/nylon fabric has a touch of spandex added for comfortable stretch. Front zipper is hidden under a bar-tacked closure placket that shields you from the wind. Built-in stow-away hood rolls up and zips into collar. Kuhl-exclusive 5-panel articulated sleeves deliver excellent range of motion. 2 snap-close chest pockets let you stash easy-access items. The Kuhl Rekon Jacket also has 2 drop-in, snap-close hand cargo pockets, one featuring an extra pocket with a vertical zipper.
short_description: The lightweight men's Kuhl Rekon Jacket makes a great travel companion on windy days, whether you're exploring urban canyons or wave-tossed coastlines.
